moves.name: Pound
moves.description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg, etc.

moves.name: Charm
moves.description: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. The target's Attack is harshly lowered.

moves.name: Encore
moves.description: The user compels the target to keep using only the move it last used for three turns.

moves.name: Sing
moves.description: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.

moves.name: Sweet Kiss
moves.description: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

moves.name: Copycat
moves.description: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.

moves.name: Magical Leaf
moves.description: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack will not miss.
